original_title: R.E.M.: When the Light is Mine
overview: This is the first complete overview of R.E.M.'s videos for I.R.S. Records, developed and compiled by all four original members of R.E.M. DVD features over two hours of content including all 11 music videos, TV performances, and interviews, plus the unseen music video for "Wolves, Lower."
title: R.E.M.: When the Light is Mine
